item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [Global][Databases] - MongoDB upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 16, 01:00 UTC  -  Mar 26, 23:00 UTC

Jan 30, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for business and enterprise plans, a small downtime may be experienced for essential plans (less than 15mn).
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of our MongoDB offer.

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/03/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode and the registries will be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a version upgrade on the registries.

item.title: [GRA][Database] - legacy Redis registries upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 13, 13:00 - 16:00 UTC

Feb 9, 23:59 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/02/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 13/02/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Garbage collection, replication and vulnerability scan will not be possible during the upgrade on legacy registries.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for legacy Redis registries

item.title: [GRA][AI&MachineLearning] - Infrastructure migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 13, 09:00 - 12:00 UTC

Feb 10, 01:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/02/2023 09:00 UTC
End time : 13/02/2023 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Downtime of 30 min during the maintenance time.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we migrating our service to a new infrastructure. No impact for cloud database customers as services will not be impacted, only acquisition and control. AI core services and DataConvergence services will be not usable during downtime.

item.title: [BHS/GRA][AI] - Notebooks/Training/Deploy
item.description:
Feb 9, 20:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/02/2023 14:30 UTC
End Time : 09/02/2023 20:06 UTC
Root cause :Authentication component update induced change in user authorization
Service status :Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 9, 17:17 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Feb 9, 17:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/02/2023 14:30 UTC
Service impact : Currently, customer are unable to synchronize data . New project can't be created on these products
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it
